data.title: Spectrasonic Update solution
data.meta_description:
I'm on Mac so I don't know if it work on windows but...
Make backup of all your plugin 
Reinstall old version of the three (Omnisphere trilian...
data.text:
I'm on Mac so I don't know if it work on windows but...

Make backup of all your plugin

Reinstall old version of the three (Omnisphere trilian keyscape)

Note the id of your Mac or hackintosh

Reinstall new version and patch ... use the serial of your keygen and all works

I'm on catalina last version...

Hope for win user this workaround work also..

Give feedback for all users

Thanks

Interesting x 1

List

Thanks for the info. Which version of Trilian do you reinstall? If I reinstall an update, the app just stays registered, so I still can't get challenge code. and which keygen do you use?

Interesting x 1

List

I am assuming you are talking about updates on sister site November 13th by someone with a name similar to a hated music style?

My questions is:

If this is causing problems for people, (with all due respect) why is it still there to be downloaded?

Actually I saw a comment saying at least one of these is just the same as on the website, which everyone ought to know to keep away from unless someone with knowledge says it is ok.

Anyway, it is one thing if people don't follow instructions, but this just seems like a trap.

Does this have anything to do with it being Friday the 13th?

No!! Don't download the links!! Don't download the links you fool!! Ahhhhh!!

The r4e updates work great on Windows.

I did not need to even reauthorize Keyscape or Omnisphere, but I did need to do reauthorize Trillian.

The only "tricky" thing with that is to click on the blue 'click here' at the bottom of the Authorization screen...

That copies the Authorization URL to clipboard and then to run the appropriate "xxx Challenge Code Decoder"

( Trilian 1.5.0d Challenge Code Decoder in this case).

Then you paste in as usual.

So how do you find trilian, working ok?

It seems r4e confirmed that 1.5 trilian is buggy, missing gui stuff, resources were batch exported from omnisphere etc. basically trilian 1.5 is unreliable and unfinished

Omni and keyscape updates seem all OK

Hmm .. I am looking ..I usually use Omnisphere interface.

Trilian is looking ok so far but i am not used to looking at it.

Thanks for the info - I will keep checking it.

Oh, now I see what he is saying in the comments:

someone said: "Anyone having issues with the presets not being saved? On about every third restart of logic, Trillian won't recall my saved preset and I'm presented with an empty default GUI."

r4e replied,"Trilian is quite buggy in v1.5, we should wait for another update."

Yea preset issue, fx GUI stuff missing, crashing even before being cracked: i think ill skip this trilian update..

but, i think the others are good

Useful x 1

List

You were reading something wrong and didn't continue reading to the solving comments.

Missing GUI elements only appear when you don't update the patch library.

Also resources weren't "batch exported" from Omnisphere, Trilian now is just based on Omnisphere as I could see.

Yes, sometimes it crashes (on windows only) but most incidents appear by incorrect usage.

Nope it's not. You just have to use the software updates and the patch library updates. Thats it.

The keygen is currently not able to patch further updates besides Omnisphere. That's why I added the patches manually

to the post on the sister site.

Like x 2

List
